'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Points of interest==
* This firing position has been a shelter for Rauataian soldiers before they were killed by the naga. Now its a store for loot - and holds a dead naga with a soul that can be read to convince [[Sugaan]] of your peaceful intentions. It has to accessed through the [[kitchen]].
* This whole are is filled with explosive barrels and piles of gunpowder - so be careful when using fire or shock spells!

==Characters==
* [[Yanass]]: The soul of a naga who gives you information to advance the quest [[A Distant Light]] peacefully.

==Loot==
* [[Artillerist's Manual]]: On the body in the south end.

==Trivia==
* After walking in sight of the explosive barrels:
:'''[[Aloth]]''': ''"Do these people normally leave this much black power lying about?"''
:'''[[Eder]]''': ''"Anybody mind if I smoke? I'll- I'll be careful."''
:'''[[Maia]]''': ''"Smells like home, doesn't it Ishi?"''
:'''[[Pallegina]]''': ''"Di verus, are the Rauataians here to colonize the Deadfire or blow it all to pieces?"''
:'''[[Serafen]]''': ''"You lot hold course. I'll be staying back here, not getting myself blown thrice to shit and shit again."''
:'''[[Tekehu]]''': ''"Now where did I put my flint and steel."''
:'''[[Xoti]]''': ''"Is it me, or is that an awful lot of black powder?"''
